course_description: Axioms of probability, univariate and multivariate distributions, convergence of sequences of random variables, Markov chains, random processes, martingales.
prerequisites: BIOS 512 and BIOS 513 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:50am in Grace Crum Rollins TBA
